directions: Cook beans in large pot of boiling salted water until beans are crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Drain. Rinse beans under cold water to cool. Dry beans on clean towels. Chill.

Combine beans and radishes in large bowl. Whisk remaining ingredients to blend in small bowl. Add enough dressing to beans and radishes to season to taste. Season to taste with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: 1 pound green beans, cut diagonally into 2-inch pieces
1/4 cup balsamic vinegar or 3 tablespoons red wine vinegar
title: Green Bean and Radish Salad
